file_content.text: You--you--the old man sent you for me, didn't he? He must have gotten my distress signal.
I guess he's good for something. He kept talking about some Sith he was working with. He didn't mention you were a filthy alien.
He didn't mention you were an insufferable fool.
Funny.
Watch your tongue, scum.
I guess the old fool's still good for something. You're the Sith he's told me so much about, aren't you?
What were you doing here?
What's going on?
I wasn't visiting the old man, that's for sure.
I don't have time for a chat.
I'm just glad I don't have to take orders from the old man.
Bessiker's not a fool. He's a smart man.
Respect your father.
Ha! Some Sith you are. Non-Sith are just pawns in our game, nothing more.
Now get me out of here!
Your father said you were after a very special item.
Bessiker mentioned a holocron.
Figures he'd go blabbing about it. But I guess the damage is done.
Why are you here?
Give me one good reason.
Why should I?
My master's powerful. I'm sure you've heard of him--Lord Esdras. He won't be happy if I don't come back alive.
My master sent me here for a holocron the Republic dug up someplace or other.
I got the holocron. Now all I have to do is get out of this place.
What purpose does this object serve?
Tell me about this holocron.
It's not the holocron itself that's special.
You wouldn't happen to have this holocron on you?
Where is it?
Don't worry--it's safely hidden in my robes.
The holocron's a map. It's supposed to point to a powerful weapon of the dark side that's hidden here on Balmorra.
The weapon's mine if I find it, which I will, now that you're here to free me.
I'll free you, if you give me the holocron.
Let's make a deal.
Ha! I'm not afraid of you. I'm injured, but I'm still Sith! I found the holocron! It's mine! Now let me out of here!
I hate to do this, but your old man needs a lesson.
I'm sorry.
Too bad you won't live to teach it to him.
You leave one way--as a corpse.
No.
Not without a fight, I won't.
I'm really too kind.
Fine. Go. [Free Hiran]
You're lucky I like your father.
For the major. [Free Hiran]
Thank you for telling me all about this lovely new toy.
Actually, the weapon's mine.
If you plan on taking that weapon, you're going to have to fight me first!
Best get out of here while the way is clear.
Go then. [Free Hiran]
Looks like you and my old man are one of a kind--both weak.
I'll be sure to tell him what you did for me. Maybe he'll reward you.
It was a pleasure meeting you as well.
You're welcome.
You just don't get it, do you?
Good riddance.
I wouldn't count on it.
You should have more respect for your father.
Bessiker's a good man.
Respect him? I'm Sith. I don't respect what I can just as easily kill.
Don't you lay a finger on me!
